name: UIScrollTypeMask
desc: A bit mask identifying the scroll type of a pan gesture.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new scroll type mask from the raw value.

items.name: static var all: UIScrollTypeMask
items.desc: A scroll type that is either discrete or continuous.

items.name: static var continuous: UIScrollTypeMask
items.desc: A continuous scroll type from a device, like a trackpad.

items.name: static var discrete: UIScrollTypeMask
items.desc: A discrete scroll type from a device, like a mouse.
